Button

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua.

Details

  • Extends: USWDS Button component
  • Honeycrisp: Button atom
  • Customization: Design tokens and Styles
  • Modifier : .cfa-button

The Button extends the USWDS Button component. The visual appearance is modified using design tokens applied to the USWDS Button component settings from the Honeycrisp Button atom. Further styling is applied using the CSS modifier .cfa-alert to add styles defined in a custom stylesheet.

  1. Existing research references

  2. Manual accessibility tests

  3. Automated accessibility tests

  4. Basic usability tests

  5. Assistive tech usability tests
